subject: 48 Hours E-mail Alert
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 






Exposed Saturday, June 30, at 10 
      p.m. ET/PT 
An amateur photographer named 
      Bill Bradford lured women in southern California who had 
      dreams of becoming models and actresses. He turned out to be a serial 
      killer. But how many victims were there in all? 
 
Fast forward 20 years – "CSI: 
      Miami" 
      star Eva La Rue discovers she came face-to-face with this killer in real 
      life, and she is finally forced to deal with it.
 
Correspondent Bill 
      Lagattuta 
      reports for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, this Saturday at 10 p.m. ET/PT. 

 
Watch Lagattuta's reporter's 
      notebook.
